name: FSX Steam Edition: Cessna® 310R Add-On
detailed_description:
This rendition of the Cessna® 310R by Military Visualizations breathes life into a genuine classic. From careful, highly detailed modelling both inside and out, smooth custom gauge animations, finely crafted textures and high fidelity sounds recorded from the real aircraft, we've ensured that this twin is as close as possible to the real aircraft.

Careful attention detail has been paid to the flight dynamics, with a heavy focus on creating an aircraft that is true-to-life not only in the visual department, but also in the way it handles. The 310R is a powerful and capable aircraft and we wanted to capture an authentic feel to the controls.

Features:

  • Realistic flight dynamics
  • Start up and shutdown procedures
  • Comprehensive systems and avionics
  • Functional doors, compartments, and inflatable main door seal
  • 5 HD liveries
  • Realistic night lighting, landing lights and custom effects
  • High quality external and internal models
  • Highly detailed product operating handbook included

fullgame.name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features

legal_notice: Cessna® 310R is a trademark of Textron Innovations Inc. and is used under license to RailSimulator.com Ltd d/b/a/ Dovetail Games.
